marilib.aircraft_model.operations.mission_f.f_mission(aircraft, dist_range, tow, altp, mach, disa)[source]¶

Mission computation using breguet equation, fixed L/D and fixed sfc

marilib.aircraft_model.operations.mission_f.f_mission_coupling(aircraft)[source]¶

Mass-Mission coupling This relation is put apart from nominal_mission because GEMS does not manage functions that compute their own input
